     242             :   // Because of a bug in MS C++ compiler nsDOMSlots must be declared public,
     243             :   // otherwise nsXULElement::nsXULSlots doesn't compile.
     244             :   /**
     245             :    * There are a set of DOM- and scripting-specific instance variables
     246             :    * that may only be instantiated when a content object is accessed
     247             :    * through the DOM. Rather than burn actual slots in the content
     248             :    * objects for each of these instance variables, we put them off
     249             :    * in a side structure that's only allocated when the content is
     250             :    * accessed through the DOM.
     251             :    */
